posts.post_content: Selling   1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plugs---High Grade Kid Nichols  SGC 60--$7000---SGC 40 Tommy McCarthy $1000---SGC 20 Dan Brouthers (Balt) $1000--Great prices on Mccarthy and Brouthers---Nichols is tough to find in this high grade---check scans---if you would like to see back scans, email me----I prefer paypal gift--checks--money orders.---I do have other N300's if you are looking for some---thanks,  Don    email address   [url]dhontz1@maine.rr.com[/url]---
